title: [Comet Crew] Part 1 Map ShoppingCart to MB2B order structure for NGMobile
description:
Description
Orders will be sent to Carmen via MB2B (using OMS/OE).
We shall map the shopping cart's content into the MB2B order structure for NGMobile Checkout.
This BE feature will be used by the FE on the Summary Page of the NGMobile Checkout (see epic MAGBUS-101130).
Open points for target solution
document generation?
Auftragsdokument
VVI/VZF
digital signature?
identity check?
when are known limitations of MB2B fixed (e.g. "parking" of an order)?
Before an order can be sent to MB2B for execution, some documents (Auftragsdokument, VVI/VZF) must be created for compliance reasons and, if necessary, signed by the customer. Who generates these documents? Can BSP's existing business logic be re-used? How is the customer's consent obtained and documented?
MB2B supports fewer order features than BSP and will need to be extended accordingly by the BSPace team.
